products.name: Roller Blinds
products.description: Simple and modern blinds that roll up neatly. Available in blackout, sunscreen, and light-filtering fabrics. Easy to operate and maintain.

products.name: Combi Blinds
products.description: Dual-layer blinds that combine sheer and solid fabrics for versatile light control. Stylish and suitable for modern interiors.

products.name: Zebra Blinds
products.description: Blinds with alternating sheer and solid stripes, allowing for adjustable light and privacy. Modern and dynamic look.

products.name: Vertical Blinds
products.description: Ideal for large windows and sliding doors. Slats can be rotated for light control and privacy.

products.name: Roman Blinds
products.description: Elegant fabric blinds that fold into soft pleats. Adds a classic and cozy touch to any room.

products.name: Venetian Blinds
products.description: Blinds with horizontal slats that can be tilted for precise light control. Durable and easy to clean.

products.name: Pleated Blinds
products.description: Blinds with crisp, pleated fabric for a modern look. Compact and suitable for small spaces.

products.name: Blackout Blinds
products.description: Designed to block out sunlight completely. Ideal for bedrooms, media rooms, or any space needing maximum privacy.

products.name: Sheer Blinds
products.description: Translucent blinds that diffuse natural light, creating a soft and airy atmosphere.

products.name: Skylight Blinds
products.description: Specially designed for skylight windows. Available in blackout and light-filtering options.

products.name: Motorized Blinds
products.description: Automated blinds for convenience and smart home integration. Available for most blind types.

products.name: Panel Blinds
products.description: Large fabric panels ideal for wide windows or as room dividers. Smooth sliding operation.

services.name: Free Installation
services.description: Professional installation service, ensuring a perfect fit and finish.

services.name: Free Quotation
services.description: Get a free quote for your window treatment needs.

services.name: Measurement Tutorial
services.description: Guide and tips on how to measure your windows accurately for the best fit.

services.name: Custom Measurements and Fittings
services.description: Blinds are custom-made to your window sizes for a tailored look.

services.name: After-Sales Support
services.description: Ongoing support for maintenance, repairs, and product questions.

services.name: Consultation
services.description: Expert advice to help you choose the right blinds and materials for your space.

inside_mount.description: Blinds will fit inside the window frame. This provides a clean, minimalist, and built-in look.
steps: Step 1: Measure the inside width of the frame at the top, middle, and bottom. Record the smallest measurement.
Step 2: Measure the inside height of the frame on the left, center, and right. Record the smallest measurement.
Step 3: Do NOT make any deductions. Our factory will adjust the size for a perfect fit.

outside_mount.description: Blinds will be mounted outside the window frame on the wall or trim. This is ideal for shallow frames or maximum light blocking.
steps: Step 1: Measure the total width you want the blinds to cover. Add 2–3 inches to each side beyond the window frame for better coverage.
Step 2: Measure the height from where you want the blinds to start (usually above the frame) down to the desired endpoint. Add 2–3 inches below the window frame if needed.

tips: Check for any obstructions like window handles, cranks, or molding before measuring.
Use a metal tape measure for accuracy.
Record measurements in either inches or centimeters — just be consistent.
Double-check all measurements. Measure twice, order once.
Round down to the nearest 1/8 inch (or 0.32 cm) for best accuracy.
